title: Ministry of Agriculture to showcase small farm machinery

tasks.task: Visit and observe machinery shipment for agricultural efficiency
subtasks: Walk alongside the machinery as it's brought in
Examine the types of machinery, such as tillers and cultivators
Note the purpose of the shipment to reduce labor reliance
Observe Ambassador's explanation of modern agriculture importance
Listen to ambassador's commitment to St. Lucia's agriculture development
Understand the collaborative agriculture project between Taiwan and St. Lucia

tasks.task: Explore the idea of integrating technology into agriculture
subtasks: Discuss the benefits of farm mechanization with the minister
Address the goal of making agriculture more attractive to younger farmers
Analyze the potential for year-round crop production through mechanization
Consider how new technologies can enhance food security

tasks.task: Plan public showcases for machinery introduction
subtasks: Develop logistics for farmers to access the machinery
Determine the cost structure for machinery usage
Coordinate the timing and location of the public showcase
